sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Hudson City Bancorp ( HCBK ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 3.8%.
Year to date, Hudson City Bancorp has lost about 4.6% of its value.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is American Express ( AXP ), trading down 5.0%.
American Express is lower by about 17.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Salesforce.com ( CRM ), trading down 3.1%, and Mattel ( MAT ), trading up 3.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
